notesStmt.note: This manuscript compiles several short texts on the fruits of reciting the "Caṇḍī," i.e. the Devīmāhātmya. Title "Caṇḍīpāṭhakrama" from colophon, f. 3r. Title abbreviation in upper left of verso folios reads "Caṇḍī." Cataloged by Poleman as Caṇḍīpāthaphalakramavidhāna from the [Marīcitantra] Marīcikalpatantra. Cf. UPenn Ms. Coll. 390, Item 156.
Fair condition. Leaves 1 and 5 worm-eaten, affecting parts of seven lines of text. Mistakes crossed through or blotched out with black. Marginal corrections.
Begins (f. 1v): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ śatacaṁḍividhi likhyate vārāhitaṁtre caṁḍipāṭhap[!]alaṁ devi śṛṇuṣva vadato mama śatāvartyā tu pāṭhānāṁ yathāvat kathayāmi te 1
Colophon, f. 3r: iti śrīvārāhitaṁtre haragaurisaṁvāde caṁḍipāṭhakramaḥ sampūraṇaṁ
Colophon, f. 3v: iti kroḍataṁtre śatāvartticaṁḍipāṭhaphalaṁ samāptam
Heading, f. 3v: athāto haragaurisaṁvāde caṁḍīpāṭhakāmyaphalaṁ vakṣate

Colophon, f. 5r: iti śrīmarīcikalpe taṁtre brahmāgastyasaṁvāde caṁḍīpāṭhaphalakramavidhānaṁ samāptam yādṛśaṁ pustakaṁ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṁ likhitaṁ mayā yadi śuddham aśuddhaṁ ca mama doṣo na dīyate phāguna kṛṣṇa 4 saṁ* 1918
